[Home](./index.md) &gt; [eth-connect](./eth-connect.md) &gt; [BigNumber](./eth-connect.bignumber.md) &gt; [isGreaterThanOrEqualTo](./eth-connect.bignumber.isgreaterthanorequalto.md)

## BigNumber.isGreaterThanOrEqualTo() method

Returns `true` if the value of this BigNumber is greater than or equal to the value of `n`<!-- -->, otherwise returns `false`<!-- -->.

```ts
(0.3 - 0.2) >= 0.1                                  // false
x = new BigNumber(0.3).minus(0.2)
x.isGreaterThanOrEqualTo(0.1)                       // true
BigNumber(1).isGreaterThanOrEqualTo(x)              // true
BigNumber(10, 18).isGreaterThanOrEqualTo('i', 36)   // true

```

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
isGreaterThanOrEqualTo(n: BigNumber.Value, base?: number): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  n | [BigNumber.Value](./eth-connect.bignumber.value.md) | A numeric value. |
|  base | number | The base of n. |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean
